explains: n. 远景，狭长的街景；展望；回顾
n. （Vista）人名；（意）维斯塔；（西）比斯塔

sentences.en: You turn a corner and see a vista, and your imagination bolts away.
sentences.cn: 你转过一个拐角，看到一片远景，然后你的幻想一下子就消失了。

sentences.en: From my bedroom window I looked out on a crowded vista of hills and rooftops.
sentences.cn: 我从自己卧室的窗口向外眺望远处密集的山峦和屋顶。

sentences.en: The Sun Vista went down in international waters.
sentences.cn: Sun Vista 这艘航舰消失在国际水域。
